amendatorysection.catchline: Juvenile pretrial diversion program; data; duties.
amendatorysection.para: (1) On January 30 of each year, every county attorney or city attorney of a county or city which has a juvenile pretrial diversion program shall report to the Director of Juvenile Diversion Programs the information pertaining to the program required by rules and regulations adopted and promulgated by the Nebraska Commission on Law Enforcement and Criminal Justice.
(2) Juvenile pretrial diversion program data shall be maintained and compiled by the Director of Juvenile Diversion Programs.
